sentences.simplifiedText: 我们学校的女生一律长发。
sentences.traditionalText: 我們學校的女生一律長髮。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒmen xuéxiào de nǚshēng yīlǜ cháng fā.
sentences.translation: All the girls in our school have long hair.

sentences.simplifiedText: 为了确保平等，入场规则一律适用于所有人。
sentences.traditionalText: 為了確保平等，入場規則一律適用於所有人。
sentences.pinyin: Wèile quèbǎo píngděng, rùchǎng guīzé yīlǜ shìyòng yú suǒyǒu rén.
sentences.translation: To ensure equality, the rules of admission applies equally to everyone.

sentences.simplifiedText: 公司规定，员工一律穿着固定制服。
sentences.traditionalText: 公司規定，員工一律穿著固定制服。
sentences.pinyin: gōngsī guīdìng, yuángōng yīlǜ chuānzhuó gùdìng zhìfú.
sentences.translation: The company stipulates that all employees must wear specific uniforms.

sentences.simplifiedText: 为了公平竞争，所有参赛者的赛车一律由承办方提供。
sentences.traditionalText: 為了公平競爭，所有參賽者的賽車一律由承辦方提供。
sentences.pinyin: wèile gōngpíng jìngzhēng, suǒyǒu cānsàizhě de sàichē yīlǜ yóu chéngbàn fāng tígōng.
sentences.translation: In the interest of fairness, the organizers will provide the racing cars to all competitors.
